drink.ruleA: The crowd cheers, laughs or whistles.
drink.ruleC: Al talks about his high school football glory days.
drink.ruleD: Al won't have sex with Peggy.

chug.ruleA: There's a scene at the shoe store.
chug.ruleB: There's a scene at the strip club.

finish.ruleA: Al puts his hand in his pants.
